group_1.textRight: Nngh...ugh...

group_1.textLeft: Thank goodness, you've opened your eyes.

group_1.textRight: Huh? I...

group_1.textLeft: I happened to come to the roof@and saw you on the ground,
so I was taking care of you.

group_1.textRight: I don't remember...anything...
[chara:800100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
That ring...@You're a Magical Girl, aren't you...?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
If you know about that, then,@are you one as well?

group_1.textRight: N-no. Don't come near me...

group_1.textLeft: Well, there is no need to be frightened.@There is no danger anymore.

group_1.textRight: You're lying...
I fell down because of you guys...

group_1.textLeft: U-um, I believe there is a misunderstanding!
There is no need for hostilities,@nor was it my intention.

group_1.textRight: But I heard that you Magical Girls...
you...
Claiming that we are the ones@who caused your injury, how terrible...
You know without us,@you would have lost your life...?
Uh...urk...

group_1.textLeft: You cannot simply throw the entire world@into one generalization.
Before you get excited over "overblown rumors"@and spout off ridiculous things,
I want you to take a look at the reality@that you've been saved in.
Rabi? Sasha?

group_1.textRight: …………[wait:0.8][chara:800100:lipSynch_1]I'm sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? No, I'm glad you've come to understand.

group_1.textRight: But be careful,
because if people find out you're a Magical Girl,@there could be danger.
Haa～♪
[chara:103501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]The dinner at this hotel was so delicious♪

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I was especially surprised by the roast beef.
Even though the theme was locally produced food,@I never knew local wagyu beef could be this good.
Next time, I will have to challenge myself@with recreating the seasoning.
...I still find this strange.

group_1.textRight: Lady Nayuta?
Despite me being a local, are you still uncomfortable@with me staying with you?

group_1.textLeft: No, I don't mind the two of you staying@together with me.
But I don't understand the reasoning behind this.

group_1.textRight: As I said,@it is to protect you, Lady Nayuta.
Right, there is no Automatic Purification System,@so it would be too dangerous for you to be alone.

group_1.textLeft: But, saying it is to protect me,@what are you protecting me from...?
Naturally there are Witches,@but I feel this is being overblown...
And I am still lingering over what@that girl we saved earlier had said.
Wait, are you saying you are protecting me from...@the public...?

group_1.textRight: That's not it at all.@Nayuta, you're thinking too hard.
Really, Rabi and I are just preparing for any@unexpected bumps♪

group_1.textLeft: Is that true...?

group_1.textRight: By the way, regarding the way that girl we helped earlier reacted,
Yukuni has more people that know of Magical Girls@than any other town.
However, it is only among students, treated no differently from a rumor or urban legend.

group_1.textLeft: (That was quite an overreaction for something like@that...)
